title: Nice 2 bedroom 2 bathroom apartment in quiet tree lined street.
posting_body: Nice 2 bedroom 2 bathroom apartment in quiet tree lined street.
Decent basic apartment.
Clean.
Nothing fancy.
Best suited for single person.
Available for August 1st.
$750 rent.
Beautiful up to date 1 Bedroom, Living room and Dining room Apt with a 2nd room for storage or office space.
Spacious living and dining rooms.
Good kitchen with quality appliances.
Hard wood floors throughout the house.
Electric baseboard heat controlled room by room with individual thermostats.
Laundry hook ups available in basement for an extra fee.
Approximately 900 square feet of living space.
$20 Application fee for each occupant 18 years of age and older.
We do an eviction and criminal search on each applicant.
We cannot rent to anyone who has been evicted within the last five years.
We cannot rent to anyone who owes a former landlord for unpaid rent or unpaid damages.
References and emergency contacts required.
One year or more lease.
Available now.
Only $750 rent.
Garbage, Water, Sewage, Hot Water, and Lawn Care are included in the rent.
Tenant pays for Electric.
$545 Security Deposit.
Looking for a friendly tenant who pays their rent on time and in full every month to take excellent care of this fine home!!!
Address of available apartment is 340 Cypress Avenue, Apt 2; Johnstown, PA 15902.
Go down Ohio Street in Moxham.
Turn right on Cypress Avenue (about 4 blocks up from Sheetz).
Go two blocks and the building will be on your right just beyond the corner of Cypress Avenue and Lunen Street.
Park in front on the street.
Won’t last long!
TEXT>>

right now to tour this beauty!
